ECB meeting is in the future and no policy decision was reported today.
No evidence that the Nasdaq-100 closed at or above 20,000 in today’s coverage.
No EIA inventory figures were cited; threshold not confirmed reached.
No MBA weekly mortgage rate reported; outcome not yet determined.
No EU Council announcement of a new Russia sanctions package in today’s news.
Meta has not reported Q3 results yet; no revenue figures in today’s articles.
No Drewry WCI update provided; comparison to Sep 5 level not verifiable from today’s news.
No DOL jobless-claims data mentioned; 4-week average status unknown.
No USD/JPY level reported; threshold of 155.00 not confirmed.
ONS August GDP release is still ahead; no figure reported today.
